CustomField.description: Enter whether opp counts towards Remaining Retainer Balance in Sub-Account Retainer (Related to Season). If unchecked, Opp will not count towards retainer and will, therefore, not appear on any Retainer Level Reporting
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter whether opp counts towards Remaining Retainer Balance in Sub-Account Retainer (Related to Season). If unchecked, Opp will not count towards retainer and will, therefore, not appear on any Retainer Level Reporting
CustomField.label: zRetainer - Count Towards Balance
